articles.author: RUTH BROWN
articles.title: Flaco the owl dies after colliding with a New York building - The Associated Press
articles.description: Flaco, the Eurasian eagle-owl who escaped from New York City’s Central Park Zoo and became one of the city’s most beloved celebrities as he flew around Manhattan, has died. Zoo officials announced the news on Friday. A little over one year after he was freed …
articles.content: NEW YORK (AP) Flaco, the Eurasian eagle-owl who escaped from New York Citys Central Park Zoo and became one of the citys most beloved celebrities as he flew around Manhattan, has died, zoo officials … [+2652 chars]

articles.author: Carly Thomas
articles.title: Wendy Williams Breaks Silence on Aphasia and Dementia Diagnosis: “Immense Gratitude” - Hollywood Reporter
articles.description: "I continue to need personal space and peace to thrive. Please just know that your positivity and encouragement are deeply appreciated," said Williams in a rare statement, shared by her rep on Friday.
articles.content:
Wendy Williams is speaking out for the first time following her recent primary progressive aphasia and frontotemporal dementia diagnosis (FTD).
A representative for the former talk show host shared … [+2661 chars]
